statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, age, preference1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT customer_id, name FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference1 = 'coffee'
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference2 IS NOT NULL
SELECT customer_id, age, preference1, preference2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, preference1, preference2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference1 = 'Fitness' OR preference2 = 'Music' ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age IS NOT NULL
SELECT name, CONCAT('Age: ', age, ' | Preferences: ', preference1, ', ', preference2) AS details FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age < 25
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM marketing_content;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, preferences FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_text FROM marketing_content WHERE content_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT content_title, content_text FROM marketing_content WHERE content_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customer_preferences WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, age FROM customer_preferences WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, description FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, status FROM customer_campaign_mapping WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, status FROM customer_preferences JOIN customer_campaign_mapping ON customer_preferences.customer_id = customer_campaign_mapping.customer_id WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE preferences->>'category'='Electronics';

SELECT p.name AS product_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM products p JOIN purchases pu ON p.product_id = pu.product_id JOIN transactions t ON pu.purchase_id = t.purchase_id GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.name AS product_name, pr.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id JOIN transactions tr ON pu.purchase_id = tr.purchase_id JOIN products pr ON pr.product_id = pu.product_id WHERE tr.amount > 1000;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, COUNT(p.product_id) AS total_purchases FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING COUNT(p.product_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT id, product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customer_products GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN customer_products cp ON c.id = cp.customer_id JOIN products p ON cp.product_id = p.id WHERE cp.quantity > 1 ORDER BY p.price ASC;
SELECT c.name, c.email, COUNT(cp.product_id) AS total_products FROM customers c JOIN customer_products cp ON c.id = cp.customer_id GROUP BY c.name, c.email HAVING total_products >= 3;

SELECT c.name, pc.purchased_date, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN customer_products pc ON c.id = pc.customer_id JOIN products p ON pc.product_id = p.id WHERE p.category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY pc.purchased_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT c.name, c.gender FROM customers c JOIN customer_products cp ON c.id = cp.customer_id WHERE cp.quantity > 0 ORDER BY c.gender, c.name ASC;
